channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catechesis: Communion With Jesus Christ
channel.desc: The Sisters discuss that God wants to give us this life and how grace is God?s Divine life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Father Sebastian Walshe shares the two things that were fundamental to his vocation to the priesthood, holiness and orthodoxy, and what led him to the Norbertine Fathers. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Missionary Servants Of The Poor Of The Third World
channel.desc: Community of religious and lay people in Peru who aid impoverished children and provide education and specialized care for the disabled. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: John Paul Ii: Be Not Afraid
channel.desc: An animated biography on the early life of St. John Paul II up to his election as Pope. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The First Saturdays For Kids
channel.desc: Sister Lucia teaches four children the importance of the First Saturday devotion, and the four steps necessary for fulfilling her request in this animated special. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Marian Procession From The Holy Land
channel.desc: A monthly Rosary Procession from the site of the Annunciation and Incarnation in Nazareth. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Power In My Hands
channel.desc: Families share their personal stories and anecdotes testifying to the power of the Rosary. (90 minutes).
